channel.title: Trancer3
channel.description:
Well I am making music in FL Studio 7, and I'd love to upload some of my songs here.
Here is my (not anymore lol) newest one:
[s][url=http://www.speedyshare.com/475444401.html]http://www.speedyshare.com/475444401.html[/url] - Trancer3 - Frozen Rain[/s] - (Deleted from speedyshare because it was too old)
[b]Pretty much melodic trance but i am actually not sure what genre it belongs to actually.[/b] (Trance is builded up pretty much in the beginning -except in the fx's- like techno, so I'd beleive many would call my music for 'Techno Music' or something like that.)
More songs coming later.

item.title: Trancer3
item.dc:creator: @Trancer3 Trancer3
item.description:
@Trancer3 wrote:

I couldn’t find out a way to make Trance Is My Life a complete song. Tho I’ve made some other ones:

Trancer3 - Trancy Hardstyle b[/b]
The intro to another song I am working on. Gonna spend atleast the whole week, maybe more, on this song.

Yo bro, of course I’ll teach you. But you never have time when I do

Read full topic

item.title: Trancer3
item.dc:creator: @Hardztyler Hardztyler
item.description:
@Hardztyler wrote:

Nice songs bro. Not really my style, but it owns.

You gotta teach me where to start someday, cause your tutorials do kinda only show what to do when you already know where to begin.

Keep the songs coming.

Read full topic

item.title: Trancer3
item.dc:creator: @Trancer3 Trancer3
item.description:
@Trancer3 wrote:

I’ve made some more songs now. I have all except one that I am making atm on another computer. The one I am making now is Trance too.

The song I am working with atm (Not finnished yet, in other words): Trancer3 - Trance Is My Life

Read full topic

item.title: Trancer3
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

So there are Techno/Trance fans on Moparisthebest

I thought I was the only one

Read full topic

item.title: Trancer3
item.dc:creator: @Trancer3 Trancer3
item.description:
@Trancer3 wrote:

The melody synth and the bass and the intro is made with Vanguard FX, and I used some really sweet samples in Vengeance Essential Clubsounds 1&2.

Not much is completely original, cause I’ve edited almost everything to fit in the song, and then I did put on extreme equalizers to make it less noizy.

killerman93: I actually do not like rap or hiphop or rnb, dunno why actually. Just don’t like it. Might have something to do with the rap cause it doesn’t have any melody. And I’d personally call this Melodic Trance but thats maybe just me. So sorry I did not tell what genre this was when I posted, though I fought you’d figure it out by my name.

Thx for all comments.

Read full topic

item.title: Trancer3
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

Wow…I’m amazed. I’ll have to give those youtube tutorials another go, as I fail miserably at FL Studio. Did you use any instruments that don’t come with FL by default? As I never know were to find them, and all the ones build in aren’t that great for making trance/techno. I really must say, this is excellent work! Keep it up!

Read full topic

item.title: Trancer3
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I heard no techno, nothing that was even slightly techno in fact

I was pleasantly suprised Trancer, this was pretty leet. If I had to suggest something (for CC :)) I’d say your arrangement and suchlike is pretty good, but the sound design could be worked on a tad. What synths did you use? I assume that was not the 3xOsc (it could have been though, you’d be surprised what you can squeeze out of that thing :p).

Also, you need a screaming lead somewhere to make my ears bleed, but that’s just my personal taste.

Read full topic

item.title: Trancer3
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

Ill check this out.
You got ma head bouncin

You need someone to rap in this, and please get a bit less techno

Pretty much melodic trance but i am actually not sure what genre it belongs to actually. (Trance is builded up pretty much in the beginning -except in the fx’s- like techno, so I’d beleive many would call my music for ‘Techno Music’ or something like that.)
